home.meta_title: Escape Road 2 - Thrilling Retro Racing Adventure
home.meta_description: Escape Road 2 is an action-packed retro-style racing game where players evade relentless police chases through dynamic cityscapes.
home.intro: Drive, escape, and outrun the cops in this action-packed racing game!

introduction_section.title: Game Introduction
introduction_section.description: Escape Road 2 is the sequel to the popular Escape Road game, delivering epic police chases to players. Drive, escape, and outrun the cops! Updated with new vehicles, environments, and features! Not simply a game, but thanks to it, you can also test your driving prowess, especially your agility at every stressful moment.

gameplay_section.title: Gameplay Mechanics
gameplay_section.description: In Escape Road 2, players must maneuver their vehicles to avoid the police's unrelenting pursuit. You must control the vehicle with the arrow keys or WASD keys in order to play Escape Road 2.

tips.driving: Master Both Driving and Foot Skills: Be just as proficient in navigating on foot and in the water as you are behind the wheel.
tips.environment: Utilize the Environment: Take advantage of the city's terrain, using alleys, buildings, and even water to your advantage.
tips.powerups: Collect Power-Ups: Gather scattered coins and upgrades to improve the car's power.
tips.skills: Drive Skillfully: Make sharp turns to divert the attention of the police.
